descriptionHtml:
This is my first Mod and I modded my favorite npc in the game.

I felt that followers were underwhelming. Especially Serana, I know that she can clear out bandits on her own and Beth made her really powerful vanilla at level 50. I play with difficulty mods that just makes pretty much turns them to tanks. I also felt lore wise she was really underwhelming. So i used to power of the daedra... I mean creation kit to fix that.

No longer will a regular vampire be capable of defeating her.

==================================================
Changes:
-> I added thunder bolt, icy spear and frost cloak and casted at a reduced cost
-> I made her reanimate undead reanimate up to level 100
-> I added a daedric dagger to her inventory
-> I gave her destruction, light armor, one handed and twin souls perks so she should do a lot of damage than vanilla.
-> I upgraded her vampiric drain to drain more health, magicka and stamina.

V2 (upcoming release TBD) !!NOT ON THE MOD YET!!

-> Adding lightfooted + silent roll
-> Adding the bat cloak
-> Buffing Valerica and Harkon (human form)
-> Adding ice form shout to all Vampire Lords


==================================================


Permissions:

I tweaked some values in CK so no permission required from me.


==================================================

Disclaimer:

This is just a combat mod, there are no visual changes and the vampire lord pictured is from "Amazing Follower tweaks".

This mod was meant to played with High level enemies and any mod that adds high level monsters at a higher level. Vanilla Serana is enough for most cases for gameplay reasons. This is so Serana fits the lore better.

==============================================================
Compatibility:

I know this works with AFT, I just tested it. Put it below any follower mods and any mods that modify Serana.
==============================================================

Additional comments:

I'm a new modder and I know very little coding so don't expect SKYRE type of mods from me so soon.

My next plans are to buff Valerica and Harkon as well.

Once I'm more experienced in modding I plan to revamp Fort Dawnguard so it is actually a fort (and satisfying for vampire players to wipe out clean).

If I get the time and the knowledge I will add a more quests with voice acted characters in Castle Volkhiar and revisit Serana.
author: roh234
